document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Brokengulf Villa on Ivory Street.
document_data.name: Brokengulf Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Brokengulf Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Brokengulf]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the north section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The villa sat along [[Ivory Street]], [[Mendever Street]], and [[Wrightstone Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: A trio of separate buildings were found within the walled estate. Each building was either three or four stories tall and arranged around a central garden.
